thread.title: New York theater named after stage and TV actor John Cullum
thread.title_full: New York theater named after stage and TV actor John Cullum

title: New York theater named after stage and TV actor John Cullum
text:
> Entertainment New York theater named after stage and TV actor John Cullum FILE - In this April 18, 2013 file photo, John Cullum attends the premiere of "Adult World" during the 2013 Tribeca Film Festival in New York.The American Theatre of Actors and The Araca Group said Friday that the off-Broadway repertory theater company’s largest venue on 54th Street will be renamed in Collum’s honor on Oct. 16. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
